com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger

Class ForwardStatisticalPosTagger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger.ForwardStatisticalPosTagger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NonDeterministicPosTagger, PosTagger

    public class ForwardStatisticalPosTagger
extends Object
implements PosTagger, NonDeterministicPosTagger
    Performs POS tagging by applying a beam search to statistical model results. Incorporates various methods of using a lexicon to constrain results.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger.PosTagger

                                   DecisionMaker decisionMaker,
                                   int beamWidth,
                                   TalismaneSession talismaneSession)
        Parameters:
        posTaggerFeatures - the set of PosTaggerFeatures used by the model which provided the decision maker
        decisionMaker - the decision maker used to make pos-tagging decisions
        beamWidth - the maximum beamwidth to consider during the beam search

    • Method Detail

      • tagSentence

        public List<PosTagSequence> tagSentence(List<TokenSequence> tokenSequences)
        Description copied from interface: NonDeterministicPosTagger
        Analyse a list of token sequences, each of which represents one possibility of tokenising a given sentence, and return the n most likely pos tag sequences for the sentence. The number of token sequences provided as input can be different from the number of pos-tagging possibilities returned as output.
        Specified by:
        tagSentence in interface NonDeterministicPosTagger
        Parameters:
        tokenSequences - the n most likely token sequences for this sentence.
        Returns:
        the n most likely postag sequences for this sentence

      • tagSentence

        public PosTagSequence tagSentence(TokenSequence tokenSequence)
        Description copied from interface: PosTagger
        Apply PosTags to the tokens in a given sentence.
        Specified by:
        tagSentence in interface PosTagger
        Parameters:
        tokenSequence - the List of tokens comprising the sentence.
        Returns:
        a List of TaggedToken reflecting the PosTags applied to the tokens.

      • getPosTaggerFeatures

        public Set<PosTaggerFeature<?>> getPosTaggerFeatures()
        Description copied from interface: PosTagger
        The set of features used to describe the sequence of PosTaggerContextImpl encountered while pos-tagging. These have to be identical to the features used to train the previously trained pos-tagging model.
        Specified by:
        getPosTaggerFeatures in interface PosTagger
